rules.text: One must respect the Code of Conduct.
One must remember the Three Gates Of Speech.
One must wear a Black & White avatar.
Please read through the rest of this extended about page for more information.

We'll head to Sitka before making our way back down to warmer waters and enjoy what remains of the summer free of foul-weather jackets.https://wiki.xxiivv.com/site/now.html
